_header: Will is good well for to do
_description: Using our will — one couplet translating ‘[…] mihi adiacet perficere autem non inuenio’, which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
[…] wil is good wel for to do[…]t quan my liking comet
                    good wil is go
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 64.
